Message:
“Um, I just need to stir this, right?
Ngh...it’s not mixing well...”

I wanted to help out Big Sis
for a change, but...urgh...

It’s not going at all
how I thought it would...

“If you stir too hard, it’ll spill!
See—stir it slowly and gently,
like this.”

Big Sis cupped her hands
over mine and helped me mix.

Wow! The super tough candy’s
mixing so smoothly now!

After we finished stirring,
Big Sis poured the melted candy
into another pot.

“All we need to do now is
add some of our witch power,
and it’ll be done!”
